title: Roth's Present
description: “You make such a pretty kitty,” said Aspen.Roth might be willing to give up control at times, but he’s a cat fairy, not a pet cat, and he’s declared he’ll never wear a kitty collar with a bell and play. How dare they even suggest such a thing?Oriel and Aspen plan to make him eat those words.Tink tink.Set after the events in A Touch of Savagery, this contains a short story with the trio. Three bonus shorts are also included.
author: Julie Mannino
